description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Explosive & relentless old skool arcade action where the object of the game is simple: use your paddle to hit and deflect the ball around the angles to destroy all coloured bricks, progressing through each stage while attempting to get the highest score you can. Scores are then shared with the community to see who comes top! The game features 3 themes and over 30 levels of non stop action.
